taskDescription:
Which of the following are real numbers: <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>4</mn>
  <mo>+</mo>
  <mi>i</mi>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <msqrt>
    <mn>77</mn>
    <mo>,</mo>
  </msqrt>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mtext>−19</mtext>
  <mo>,</mo>
  <mspace width="thinmathspace"></mspace>
  <mn>38.902</mn>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">4 + i,\,\sqrt {77,} \,\, \text{−19},\,38.902</annotation></semantics></math>?
